name: tumblr eXtras - Pink/Floral
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. This style was designed mainly with the pink/floral tumblr theme in mind. A generic/blue theme and a grey theme are also available. The purpose of this style is to provide little extras that may have been overlooked in other styles. The extras include: - replacing the big green 'Following # people' to match the theme - styling the Radar to remove the blue background frame and rounding the corners of the photo/video - turning the 'Add / Remove' category list into selection system. Also, it bids farewell to that hideous green selection bar! - providing rounded corners for just about everything that could be found And lots of other little things you'll notice along the way.
